title: Majority of clubs support Premier League in Manchester City case – Sky Sports journalist Kaveh Solhekol (Video)
description: The recent tribunal ruling in Manchester City’s case against the Premier League has caused plenty of confusion, with even the two parties involved looking at it differently. text: The recent tribunal ruling in Manchester City’s case against the Premier League has caused plenty of confusion, with even the two parties involved looking at it differently. Sky Sports journalist Kaveh Solhekol has provided some explanation as to what the respective positions of the parties are. “There is NO civil war.” ❌ Kaveh Solhekol gives the latest as Premier League clubs prepare to rally around chief executive Richard Masters at an emergency shareholders’ meeting next week. pic.twitter.com/lYbuEbNdEm — Sky Sports Premier League (@SkySportsPL) October 10, 2024
html:
The recent tribunal ruling in Manchester City’s case against the Premier League has caused plenty of confusion, with even the two parties involved looking at it differently.

Sky Sports journalist Kaveh Solhekol has provided some explanation as to what the respective positions of the parties are.

“There is NO civil war.” ❌

Kaveh Solhekol gives the latest as Premier League clubs prepare to rally around chief executive Richard Masters at an emergency shareholders’ meeting next week. pic.twitter.com/lYbuEbNdEm

— Sky Sports Premier League (@SkySportsPL) October 10, 2024
